targets.rawSql:
select toStartOfInterval(ts, interval 1 minute) AS time, sum(tx_bytes) tx_total, sum(rx_bytes) rx_total from netflows 
where cluster_id='c92acdca-b949-4ca1-b916-442c175245ce' 
and namespace='console'
and ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime ) 
group by time
order by time;

select toStartOfInterval(ts, interval 1 minute) AS time, pod_name, sum(tx_bytes) tx_total from netflows 
where cluster_id='c92acdca-b949-4ca1-b916-442c175245ce' 
and namespace='console' and pod_name like 'cluster-snapshots-%'
and ( ts >= $__fromTime AND ts <= $__toTime ) 
group by time, pod_name
order by time, pod_name
